mapper.sql: select id, wcode, orderno, pcode, pname, pspec, qty, pstar_time, pend_time, t.remark, t.is_valid, t.create_by, t.create_time, t.update_by, t.update_time, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3 from pp_wo_book_main t left join sys_user su on t.update_by = su.login_name
mapper.select: select a.id, a.wcode, a.orderno, a.pcode, a.pname, a.pspec, a.qty, a.pstar_time, a.pend_time, a.remark, a.is_valid, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time, a.attribute1, a.attribute2, a.attribute3, b.id as sub_id, b.main_id as sub_main_id, b.soncode as sub_soncode, b.mcode as sub_mcode, b.mname as sub_mname, b.mspec as sub_mspec, b.stime as sub_stime, b.etime as sub_etime, b.cwork as sub_cwork, b.cstation as sub_cstation, b.planqty as sub_planqty, b.inputqty as sub_inputqty, b.outputqty as sub_outputqty, b.stdtime as sub_stdtime, b.stdrate as sub_stdrate, b.acttime as sub_acttime, b.actrate as sub_actrate, b.remark as sub_remark, b.is_valid as sub_is_valid, b.create_by as sub_create_by, b.create_time as sub_create_time, b.update_by as sub_update_by, b.update_time as sub_update_time, b.attribute1 as sub_attribute1, b.attribute2 as sub_attribute2, b.attribute3 as sub_attribute3, c.id as sub_bom_id, c.main_id as sub_bom_main_id, c.orderno as sub_bom_orderno, c.mcode as sub_bom_mcode, c.mname as sub_bom_mname, c.mspec as sub_bom_mspec, c.attribute as sub_bom_attribute, c.onsize as sub_bom_onsize, c.moqieqty as sub_bom_moqieqty, c.qiezhiqty as sub_bom_qiezhiqty, c.qty as sub_bom_qty, c.unit as sub_bom_unit, c.unratio as sub_bom_unratio, c.ruter as sub_bom_ruter, c.remark as sub_bom_remark, c.is_valid as sub_bom_is_valid, c.create_by as sub_bom_create_by, c.create_time as sub_bom_create_time, c.update_by as sub_bom_update_by, c.update_time as sub_bom_update_time, c.attribute1 as sub_bom_attribute1, c.attribute2 as sub_bom_attribute2, c.attribute3 as sub_bom_attribute3 from pp_wo_book_main a left join pp_wo_book_detail b on b.main_id = a.id left join pp_wo_book_bom c on c.main_id = a.id where a.id = #{id} order by b.soncode,c.orderno
mapper.insert:
insert into pp_wo_book_main
id, wcode, orderno, pcode, pname, pspec, qty, pstar_time, pend_time, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3,

mapper.update: update pp_wo_book_main set is_valid = '0' where id = #{id}

mapper.insert:
insert into pp_wo_book_detail( id, main_id, soncode, mcode, mname, mspec, stime, etime, cwork, cstation, planqty, inputqty, outputqty, stdtime, stdrate, acttime, actrate, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.mainId}, #{item.soncode}, #{item.mcode}, #{item.mname}, #{item.mspec}, #{item.stime}, #{item.etime}, #{item.cwork}, #{item.cstation}, #{item.planqty}, #{item.inputqty}, #{item.outputqty}, #{item.stdtime}, #{item.stdrate}, #{item.acttime}, #{item.actrate}, #{item.remark}, #{item.createBy}, sysdate(), #{item.updateBy}, sysdate(), #{item.attribute1}, #{item.attribute2}, #{item.attribute3})

insert into pp_wo_book_bom( id, main_id, orderno, mcode, mname, mspec, attribute, onsize, moqieqty, qiezhiqty, qty, unit, unratio, ruter, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.mainId}, #{item.orderno}, #{item.mcode}, #{item.mname}, #{item.mspec}, #{item.attribute}, #{item.onsize}, #{item.moqieqty}, #{item.qiezhiqty}, #{item.qty}, #{item.unit}, #{item.unratio}, #{item.ruter}, #{item.remark}, #{item.createBy}, sysdate(), #{item.updateBy}, sysdate(), #{item.attribute1}, #{item.attribute2}, #{item.attribute3})
